params.text: Ubude nobufushane.
Ubaba uthola isigqoko sami.
Ubaba mude.
Uma uthola ihembe lami.
Ubaba mude kunoma.
Udadewethu uthola incwadi yami.
Uma mude kunodadewethu.
Umfowethu uthola isikhwama sami.
Udadewethu mude kunomfowethu.
Umfowethu mude kunami.
Ngifushane kakhulu emndenini.
Oh linda! Kukhona injana yethu, ujojo.
Ujojo uthola ama–slippers ami.
Ha ha! Ujojo nguye omfushane.
Yebo! Ujojo umfushane kunami.
Ngimfishane kunomfowethu.
Umfowethu umfushane kunodadewethu.
Udadewethu umfushane kunoma.
Uma umfushane kunobaba.
Hewu! ubaba nguye omude kunabo bonke, futhi ujojo nguye omfushane kakhulu.

"Ubude nobufushane." credits

This work, “Ubude nobufushane.”, is a derivative of “Ubude nobufushane.” as translated by Celia Bolam used under CC BY.  The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. It is based on the original story: 'ខ្ពស់និងទាប', by Huy Chheng Rattana. © Room to Read, 2015. Some changes were made to this work.

“Ubude nobufushane.” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
